properties.name: elasticsearch.clustername
properties.description: The name of the elastic cluster

properties.name: elasticsearch.nodes
properties.description: The hosts for the elastic search master nodes in a comma separated list host:port,host:port,etc

properties.name: elasticsearch.index
properties.description: The name of the index in which to store all the application data

properties.name: elasticsearch.client-transport-sniff
properties.description: Allow transport client sniff when connecting to the ES cluster

properties.name: elasticsearch.retry-max-attempts
properties.description: Maximum retry attempts at communicating with Elastic Search before failing

properties.name: elasticsearch.retry-backoff-initial-interval
properties.description: Initial interval to wait before retrying

properties.name: elasticsearch.retry-backoff-multiplier
properties.description: Multiplicator of wait interval for subsequent retrying operations

properties.name: elasticsearch.max-page-size
properties.description: Maximum size of one page of results for list type endpoints

properties.name: elasticsearch.scroll-time-to-live
properties.description: How long a scroll is left alive on ElasticSearch in milliseconds

properties.name: elasticsearch.xpack-user
properties.description: The X-Pack user in the format `username:password`

properties.name: elasticsearch.real-index-version
properties.description: The version of the ElasticSearch index. Starts with zero.
